components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to MTN Network in Nigeria

incident_updates.body: We continue experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to MTN network in Nigeria. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: We are still experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to MTN network in Nigeria. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Call Quality Problems to a Subset of Twilio's UK Numbers

incident_updates.body: Our carrier partner informed that the issue was mitigated on their end. We are still observing improvements in voice quality when calling to a subset of Twilio's UK phone numbers. We will continue to monitor to ensure full service recovery. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our carrier partner informed that the issue was mitigated on their end. We are also observing improvements in voice quality when calling to a subset of Twilio's UK phone numbers. We will continue to monitor to ensure full service recovery. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS and MMS Carrier Maintenance - AT&T

incident_updates.body: The AT&T network in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 31 March 2024 at 22:00 PDT until 01 April 2024 at 03:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to AT&T US handsets when sending via short codes.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body:
The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 01 April 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 29 April 2024 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

01 April 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 01 April 2024 at 17:00 PDT
03 April 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 03 April 2024 at 17:00 PDT
08 April 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 08 April 2024 at 17:00 PDT
10 April 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 10 April 2024 at 17:00 PDT
15 April 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 15 April 2024 at 17:00 PDT
17 April 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 17 April 2024 at 17:00 PDT
22 April 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 22 April 2024 at 17:00 PDT
24 April 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 24 April 2024 at 17:00 PDT
29 April 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 29 April 2024 at 17:00 PDT

The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 01 April 2024 at 14:00 PDT until 01 April 2024 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Beeline Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Belarus SMS Carrier Maintenance - A1, MTS and Life

incident_updates.body: The A1, MTS and Life networks in Belarus are conducting a planned maintenance from 01 April 2024 at 15:00 PDT until 01 April 2024 at 19:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to A1, MTS, Life Belarus handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Megafon and Yota

incident_updates.body: The Megafon and Yota network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 02 April 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 02 April 2024 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Megafon and Yota Russia handsets.

The T-Mobile network in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 01 April 2024 at 21:00 PDT until 02 April 2024 at 05:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from T-Mobile US handsets when sending via long codes and short codes.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Megafon and Yota

incident_updates.body: The Megafon and Yota network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 03 April 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 03 April 2024 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Megafon and Yota Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carrier Maintenance - Small US Carriers

incident_updates.body: A subset of small networks in the US are conducting a planned maintenance from 03 April 2024 at 21:30 PDT until 04 April 2024 at 03:30 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from small US carriers handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Toll-Free, North America

incident_updates.body: The AT&T network in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 03 April 2024 at 22:30 PDT until 04 April 2024 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS from and to AT&T US handsets when sending via long codes and short codes.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US and Puerto Rico SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in US and Puerto Rico is conducting a planned maintenance from 03 April 2024 at 22:30 PDT until 04 April 2024 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from US and Puerto Rico handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS and MMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS and MMS carrier partner in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 03 April 2024 at 21:00 PDT until 04 April 2024 at 01:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from US handsets via US short codes.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Multiple Destination Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our Voice carrier partner in Germany and France is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 08 April 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 24 April 2024 at 19:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects or call failures to Twilio Germany mobile and landline phone numbers, and from and to France toll free, mobile and landline phone numbers.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

08 April 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 08 April 2024 at 19:00 PDT
10 April 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 10 April 2024 at 19:00 PDT
15 April 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 15 April 2024 at 19:00 PDT
17 April 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 17 April 2024 at 19:00 PDT
22 April 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 22 April 2024 at 19:00 PDT
24 April 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 24 April 2024 at 19:00 PDT

scheduled_maintenances.name: Canada Account Security Service Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our service partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 09 April 2024 at 23:00 PDT until 10 April 2024 at 01:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for the following carriers and country: Rogers Canada, Telus Canada, Bell Canada.

Impacted Products: Verify Silent Network Auth, Lookup Identity Match, Lookup SIM Swap, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes, Lookup Line Type Intelligence [Twilio API]

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth
CARRIER NETWORK - Lookup Line Type Intelligence [Twilio API]

incident_updates.body: Twilio is conducting planned maintenance from 12 April 05:00 until 12 April 12:00 PDT on the Twilio Network Exchange in Sydney, Australia (AU1). During the maintenance window there could be intermittent impact to services with Interconnects in AU1.

Twilio is conducting a planned maintenance from 12 April 05:00 until 12 April 12:00 PDT on the Twilio network. During the maintenance window there could be intermittent impact on calls to and from Australia / New Zealand.

Twilio is conducting a planned maintenance from 13 April 07:00 until 13 April 12:00 PDT on the Twilio network. During the maintenance window there could be intermittent impact on calls to and from Australia / New Zealand.

Twilio is conducting planned maintenance from 13 April 07:00 until 13 April 12:00 PDT on the Twilio Network Exchange in Sydney, Australia (AU1). During the maintenance window there could be intermittent impact to services with Interconnects in AU1.
